featured_projects.title: AmarSolution POS App
featured_projects.description: AmarSolution is a fast, cross-platform POS app for managing sales, stock, and more across fashion, electronics, pharmacy, and other businesses.

featured_projects.title: NextGen VPN and Multimedia
featured_projects.description: NextGen is an all-in-one app with a built-in browser, free VPN, internet speed tester, and network info—designed to enhance your digital experience.

featured_projects.title: Build DokanBook: Sales & Expense App
featured_projects.description: DokanBook helps manage sales, expenses, and contacts with ease. Track cash flow, send auto messages, and stay organized—all in one app.
